welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
dbots

The universal count poster

## Example ```js const dbots = require('dbots'); const poster = new dbots.Poster({ apiKeys: { discordbotsgg: '…', topgg: '…', lsterminalink: '…', carbon: '…' } }); poster.post('carbon') // if the service is undefined, it posts to all services provided with a key ``` ## Example with a client ```js const Discord = require('discord.js'); const client = new Discord.Client(); const dbots = require('dbots'); const poster = new dbots.Poster({ client, // Client MUST be logged in to be put into a poster apiKeys: { discordbotsgg: '…', topgg: '…', lsterminalink: '…', carbon: '…' }, clientLibrary: 'discord.js' }); poster.startInterval(); // starts an interval thats posts to all services every 30 minutes ``` ## Supporting Libraries Creator | Name ----------- | ----- hydrabolt | [![npm](/static/npm.png)](https://npmjs.com/discord.js) [![GitHub](/static/github.png)](https://github.com/hydrabolt/discord.js) discord.js izy521 | [![npm](/static/npm.png)](https://npmjs.com/discord.io) [![GitHub](/static/github.png)](https://github.com/izy521/discord.io) discord.io qeled | [![npm](/static/npm.png)](https://npmjs.com/discordie) [![GitHub](/static/github.png)](https://github.com/qeled/discordie) discordie abalabahaha | [![npm](/static/npm.png)](https://npmjs.com/eris) [![GitHub](/static/github.png)](https://github.com/abalabahaha/eris) eris ## Supporting Services - [top.gg (formerly discordbots.org) `topgg` or `discordbotsorg`](https://top.gg)* - [discord.bots.gg `discordbotsgg`](https://discord.bots.gg) - [discordapps.dev `discordappsdev`](https://discordapps.dev) - [carbonitex.net `carbon`](http://carbonitex.net/discord/bots) - [botsfordiscord.com `botsfordiscord`](http://botsfordiscord.com) - [bots.ondiscord.xyz `botsondiscord`](http://bots.ondiscord.xyz) - [discordbotlist.com `discordbotlist`](https://discordbotlist.com) - [divinediscordbots.com `divinediscordbots`](https://divinediscordbots.com) - [discord.boats `discordboats`](https://discord.boats) - [botlist.space `botlistspace`](https://botlist.space) - [discordbot.world `discordbotworld`](https://discordbot.world) - [glennbotlist.xyz `glennbotlist`](https://glennbotlist.xyz) \* discordbots.org is currently rebranding to top.gg: they will gradually make changes to add new functionalities, you can find more info [here](https://medium.com/discord-bots/announcing-top-gg-the-next-phase-of-discord-bots-2ac3eb3b81bd). To ensure backwards compatibility we will keep the `discordbotsorg` service active, but only as a reference to `topgg`, keeping it in a "deprecated" state; when the rebranding will be completed, we'll publish a major version update deleting any remains of the old name. If you're reading this, please switch to the classes of the new service ;)

classes.name: Poster
classes.description: A class that posts server count to listing site(s).

params.name: options
params.description: The options needed to construct the poster.

methods.name: getServerCount
methods.description: Retrieves the current server count of the client/shard

returns.description: Amount of servers the client/shard is in

methods.name: getUserCount
methods.description: Retrieves the current user count of the client/shard

returns.description: Amount of users the client/shard is connected with

methods.name: getVoiceConnections
methods.description: Retrieves the current voice connection count of the client/shard

methods.name: startInterval
methods.description: Creates an interval that posts to all services

params.name: interval
params.description: The time (in ms) to reach to post to all {@link Service}s again.

returns.description: The interval that is responsible for posting

methods.name: stopInterval
methods.description: Destroys the current interval

methods.name: post
methods.description: Posts the current clients server count to a service

methods.name: postManual
methods.description: Manually posts a server count to a service

params.name: serverCount
params.description: The server count to post to the service

params.name: userCount
params.description: The server count to post to the service

params.name: voiceConnections
params.description: The voice connection count to post to the service

methods.name: addHandler
methods.description: Adds an handler for an event

params.name: event
params.description: The name of the event to add the handler to

params.name: handler
params.description: The function that is run with the event

returns.description: The array of handlers currently set for that event

methods.name: removeHandler
methods.description: Removes an handler for an event

params.name: event
params.description: The name of the event to remove the handler from

params.name: handler
params.description: The function that is run with the event

returns.description: The array of handlers currently set for that event

methods.name: runHandlers
methods.description: Manually triggers an event with custom arguments

params.name: event
params.description: The name of the event to run the handlers for

params.name: args
params.description: The arguments to pass to the handlers

events.name: autopost
events.description: Emitted when the interval has ran.

events.name: autopostfail
events.description: Emitted when the interval failed to post.

props.name: apiKeys
props.description: An object that pairs a {@link Service} with their token.

props.name: client
props.description:
The client that a supported {@link Library} uses to manage the Discord application.
Requires {@link #clientLibrary} to be present.

props.name: clientID
props.description:
The client ID used for posting to a {@link Service}.
Automatically filled in when {@link #client} is present.

props.name: clientLibrary
props.description: The library that the client is based on.

props.name: post
props.description:
The function to use when posting to a server that uses the client ID,
the amount of servers, and a {@link Shard}. This will be used when the {@link Service} is `custom`.

props.name: shard
props.description: The shard data for using different methods of posting to services.

props.name: serverCount
props.description:
The function to use when retrieving the amount of servers a client/shard is in.
 ^ Uses the client as a parameter.

props.name: userCount
props.description:
The function to use when retrieving the amount of users a client/shard is connected with.
 ^ Uses the client as a parameter.

props.name: voiceConnections
props.description:
The function to use when retrieving the number of active voice connections.
 ^ Uses the client as a parameter.

props.name: useSharding
props.description: Whether or not to use a {@link Service}s sharding method when posting.

typedefs.name: Shard
typedefs.description: A shard that is used when posting to services.

props.name: count
props.description: The amount of shards the client uses

props.name: id
props.description: The shard ID that is being used by the poster

typedefs.name: Service
typedefs.description:
A service supported by the package. Here are the available services:
* discordbotsgg
* discordbotsorg (deprecated)
* topgg
* botsfordiscord
* botsondiscord
* discordappsdev
* carbon
* discordbotlist
* divinediscordbots
* discordboats
* botlistspace
* discordbotworld
* glennbotlist

typedefs.name: Library
typedefs.description:
A library supported by the package. Here are the available libraries:
* discord.js
* discord.io
* discordie
* eris

typedefs.name: CustomEvent
typedefs.description:
An event that can be added an handler for. These are the available events:
* autopost

typedefs.name: PromiseResolvable
typedefs.description: Data that can be resolved to give a string. This can either be a Function or a Promise
